scripts.ci: yarn link && koinos-sdk-as-cli create mycontract && cd mycontract && yarn install && yarn link koinos-sdk-as-cli && yarn build:debug && yarn test
scripts.ci:windows: npm link && koinos-sdk-as-cli create mycontract && cd mycontract && npm install && npm link koinos-sdk-as-cli && koinos-sdk-as-cli build-all debug mycontract.proto && koinos-sdk-as-cli run-tests
